001package edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.service;
002
003import static com.google.android.gms.location.Priority.PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY;
004
005import android.Manifest.permission;
006import android.app.PendingIntent;
007import android.content.Context;
008import android.os.Looper;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
012import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
013import com.google.android.gms.common.api.Api.ApiOptions.NoOptions;
014import com.google.android.gms.common.api.internal.ApiKey;
015import com.google.android.gms.location.CurrentLocationRequest;
016import com.google.android.gms.location.DeviceOrientationListener;
017import com.google.android.gms.location.DeviceOrientationRequest;
018import com.google.android.gms.location.FusedLocationProviderClient;
019import com.google.android.gms.location.LastLocationRequest;
020import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationAvailability;
021import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationCallback;
022import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener;
023import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationRequest;
024import com.google.android.gms.location.LocationServices;
025import com.google.android.gms.tasks.CancellationToken;
026import com.google.android.gms.tasks.CancellationTokenSource;
027import com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task;
028import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.dao.LocationDao;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.entity.Location;
031import edu.cnm.deepdive.leavemealone.model.pojo.GPSCoord;
032import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
033import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Set;
036import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
037import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
038import javax.inject.Inject;
039import javax.inject.Singleton;
040
041@Singleton
042public class LocationRepository implements FusedLocationProviderClient {
043
044  public static final int GPS_UPDATE_INTERVAL_MS = 1000;
045  private final LocationDao locationDao;
046  private FusedLocationProviderClient fusedLocationProviderClient;
047  private final Executor executor;
048  private final PermissionsRepository permissionsRepository;
049  private final PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository;
050  private GPSCoord coord;
051  private final LiveData<Boolean> locationPermissionGranted;
052
053  /**
054   * This constructor does the heavy lifting for the GPS location determination.  THere are
055   * two try-catches; the forst get the intial position and the second get every subsequent
056   * position.
057   * @param context
058   * @param locationDao
059   * @param permissionsRepository
060   * @param preferencesRepository
061   */
062  @Inject
063  public LocationRepository(@ApplicationContext Context context,
064      LocationDao locationDao,
065      PermissionsRepository permissionsRepository,
066      PreferencesRepository preferencesRepository) {
067    this.locationDao = locationDao;
068    this.permissionsRepository = permissionsRepository;
069    this.preferencesRepository = preferencesRepository;
070    this.executor = Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor();
071    this.fusedLocationProviderClient = LocationServices.getFusedLocationProviderClient(context);
072
073    if (coord == null) {
074      coord = preferencesRepository.getCoord();
075    }
076
077    LiveData<Set<String>> distinctPermissions = Transformations.distinctUntilChanged(
078        permissionsRepository.getPermissions());
079    locationPermissionGranted = Transformations.map(distinctPermissions, (permissions) -> {
080      if (permissions.contains(permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION)) {
081        fusedLocationProviderClient = LocationServices.getFusedLocationProviderClient(context);
082        LocationRequest request = new LocationRequest
083            .Builder(PRIORITY_HIGH_ACCURACY, GPS_UPDATE_INTERVAL_MS)
084            .build();
085        try {  // get initial GPS locations
086          fusedLocationProviderClient
087              .getLastLocation()
088              .addOnSuccessListener(location -> {
089                coord = new GPSCoord(location.getLongitude(), location.getLatitude());
090                preferencesRepository.setCoord(coord);
091              });
092        } catch (SecurityException e) {
093          throw new RuntimeException(e);
094        }
095        try {  // get subsequent GPS locations
096          fusedLocationProviderClient.requestLocationUpdates(request, executor,
097              location -> {
098                coord = new GPSCoord(location.getLongitude(), location.getLatitude());
099                preferencesRepository.setCoord(coord);
100              });
101        } catch (SecurityException e) {
102          throw new RuntimeException(e);
103        }
104      }
105      return false;
106    });
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * This method adds a location to the database with a boolean parameter of secure
111   * where true indicates the location is secure and false indicates the location
112   * is not secure.
113   * @param secure
114   * @return
115   */
116  public Single<Long> add(Boolean secure) {
117    Location location = new Location();
118    location.setSecure(secure);
119    location.setGpsCoord(coord);
120    return locationDao
121        .insert(location)
122        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
123  }
124
125  /**
126   * The getAll method is used to return a list of locations to the viewmodel
127   * @return
128   */
129  public LiveData<List<Location>> getAll() {
130    return locationDao.getLocations();
131  }
132
133
134  @NonNull
135  @Override
136  public Task<android.location.Location> getLastLocation() {
137    return null;
138  }
139
140  @NonNull
141  @Override
142  public Task<android.location.Location> getLastLocation(
143      @NonNull LastLocationRequest lastLocationRequest) {
144    return null;
145  }
146
147  @NonNull
148  @Override
149  public Task<android.location.Location> getCurrentLocation(int i,
150      @Nullable CancellationToken cancellationToken) {
151    return null;
152  }
153
154  @NonNull
155  @Override
156  public Task<android.location.Location> getCurrentLocation(
157      @NonNull CurrentLocationRequest currentLocationRequest,
158      @Nullable CancellationToken cancellationToken) {
159    return null;
160  }
161
162  @NonNull
163  @Override
164  public Task<LocationAvailability> getLocationAvailability() {
165    return null;
166  }
167
168  @NonNull
169  @Override
170  public Task<Void> requestLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationRequest locationRequest,
171      @NonNull Executor executor, @NonNull LocationListener locationListener) {
172    return null;
173  }
174
175  @NonNull
176  @Override
177  public Task<Void> requestLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationRequest locationRequest,
178      @NonNull LocationListener locationListener, @Nullable Looper looper) {
179    return null;
180  }
181
182  @NonNull
183  @Override
184  public Task<Void> requestLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationRequest locationRequest,
185      @NonNull LocationCallback locationCallback, @Nullable Looper looper) {
186    return null;
187  }
188
189  @NonNull
190  @Override
191  public Task<Void> requestLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationRequest locationRequest,
192      @NonNull Executor executor, @NonNull LocationCallback locationCallback) {
193    return null;
194  }
195
196  @NonNull
197  @Override
198  public Task<Void> requestLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationRequest locationRequest,
199      @NonNull PendingIntent pendingIntent) {
200    return null;
201  }
202
203  @NonNull
204  @Override
205  public Task<Void> removeLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationListener locationListener) {
206    return null;
207  }
208
209  @NonNull
210  @Override
211  public Task<Void> removeLocationUpdates(@NonNull LocationCallback locationCallback) {
212    return null;
213  }
214
215  @NonNull
216  @Override
217  public Task<Void> removeLocationUpdates(@NonNull PendingIntent pendingIntent) {
218    return null;
219  }
220
221  @NonNull
222  @Override
223  public Task<Void> flushLocations() {
224    return null;
225  }
226
227  @NonNull
228  @Override
229  public Task<Void> setMockMode(boolean b) {
230    return null;
231  }
232
233  @NonNull
234  @Override
235  public Task<Void> setMockLocation(@NonNull android.location.Location location) {
236    return null;
237  }
238
239  @NonNull
240  @Override
241  public Task<Void> requestDeviceOrientationUpdates(
242      @NonNull DeviceOrientationRequest deviceOrientationRequest, @NonNull Executor executor,
243      @NonNull DeviceOrientationListener deviceOrientationListener) {
244    return null;
245  }
246
247  @NonNull
248  @Override
249  public Task<Void> requestDeviceOrientationUpdates(
250      @NonNull DeviceOrientationRequest deviceOrientationRequest,
251      @NonNull DeviceOrientationListener deviceOrientationListener, @Nullable Looper looper) {
252    return null;
253  }
254
255  @NonNull
256  @Override
257  public Task<Void> removeDeviceOrientationUpdates(
258      @NonNull DeviceOrientationListener deviceOrientationListener) {
259    return null;
260  }
261
262  @NonNull
263  @Override
264  public ApiKey<NoOptions> getApiKey() {
265    return null;
266  }
267}
